verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. Hold not thy peace <S%H2790><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%> of my praise <S%H8416><s%>;

For the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> and the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of deceit <S%H4820><s%> have they opened <S%H6605><s%> against me <S%H1696><s%>: They have spoken unto me with a lying <S%H8267><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>.
They have compassed <S%H5437><s%> me about also with words <S%H1697><s%> of hatred <S%H8135><s%>, And fought <S%H3898><s%> against me without a cause <S%H2600><s%>.
For my love <S%H160><s%> they are my adversaries <S%H7853><s%>: But I give myself unto prayer <S%H8605><s%>.
And they have rewarded <S%H7760><s%> me evil <S%H7451><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>, And hatred <S%H8135><s%> for my love <S%H160><s%>.
Set <S%H6485><s%> thou a wicked man <S%H7563><s%> over him <S%H7854><s%>; And let an adversary stand <S%H5975><s%> at his right hand <S%H3225><s%>.
When he is judged <S%H8199><s%>, let him come forth <S%H3318><s%> guilty <S%H7563><s%>; And let his prayer <S%H8605><s%> be turned into sin <S%H2401><s%>.
Let his days <S%H3117><s%> be few <S%H4592><s%>; And let another <S%H312><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> his office <S%H6486><s%>.
Let his children <S%H1121><s%> be fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, And his wife <S%H802><s%> a widow <S%H490><s%>.
Let his children <S%H1121><s%> be <S%H5128><s%> vagabonds <S%H5128><s%>, and beg <S%H7592><s%>; And let them seek <S%H1875><s%> their bread out of their desolate places <S%H2723><s%>.
Let the extortioner <S%H5383><s%> catch <S%H5367><s%> all that he hath <S%H2114><s%>; And let strangers make spoil <S%H962><s%> of his labor <S%H3018><s%>.
Let there be none to extend <S%H4900><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> unto him <S%H2603><s%>; Neither let there be any to have pity on his fatherless children <S%H3490><s%>.
Let his posterity <S%H319><s%> be cut off <S%H3772><s%>; In the generation <S%H1755><s%> following <S%H312><s%> let their name <S%H8034><s%> be blotted out <S%H4229><s%>.

Let the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%> be remembered <S%H2142><s%> with Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And let not the sin <S%H2403><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%> be blotted out <S%H4229><s%>.
Let them be before Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, That he may cut off <S%H3772><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of them from the earth <S%H776><s%>;

Because he remembered <S%H2142><s%> not to show <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%>, But persecuted <S%H7291><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H6041><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, And the broken <S%H3512><s%> in heart <S%H3824><s%>, to slay them <S%H4191><s%>.
Yea <S%H157><s%>, he loved cursing <S%H7045><s%>, and it came <S%H935><s%> unto him <S%H2654><s%>; And he delighted not in blessing <S%H1293><s%>, and it was far from him <S%H7368><s%>.

He clothed <S%H3847><s%> himself also with cursing <S%H7045><s%> as with his garment <S%H4055><s%>, And it came <S%H935><s%> into his inward <S%H7130><s%> parts like water <S%H4325><s%>, And like oil <S%H8081><s%> into his bones <S%H6106><s%>.
Let it be unto him as the raiment <S%H899><s%> wherewith he covereth <S%H5844><s%> himself <S%H4206><s%>, And for the girdle wherewith he is girded <S%H2296><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.
This is the reward <S%H6468><s%> of mine adversaries <S%H7853><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And of them that speak <S%H1696><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against my soul <S%H5315><s%>.

But deal <S%H6213><s%> thou with me <S%H3069><s%>, O Jehovah the Lord <S%H136><s%>, for thy name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake <S%H2617><s%>: Because thy lovingkindness is good <S%H2896><s%>, deliver thou me <S%H5337><s%>;
For I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>, And my heart <S%H3820><s%> is wounded <S%H2490><s%> within me <S%H7130><s%>.
I am gone <S%H1980><s%> like the shadow <S%H6738><s%> when it declineth <S%H5186><s%>: I am tossed up and down <S%H5287><s%> as the locust <S%H697><s%>.
My knees <S%H1290><s%> are weak <S%H3782><s%> through fasting <S%H6685><s%>; And my flesh <S%H1320><s%> faileth <S%H3584><s%> of fatness <S%H8081><s%>.
I am become also a reproach <S%H2781><s%> unto them <S%H7200><s%>: When they see me <S%H5128><s%>, they shake their head <S%H7218><s%>.
Help <S%H5826><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah my God <S%H430><s%>; Oh save <S%H3467><s%> me according to thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>:
That they may know <S%H3045><s%> that this is thy hand <S%H3027><s%>; That thou <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, hast done it <S%H6213><s%>.
Let them curse <S%H7043><s%>, but bless <S%H1288><s%> thou <S%H6965><s%>: When they arise, they shall be put to shame <S%H954><s%>, But thy servant <S%H5650><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%>.
Let mine adversaries <S%H7853><s%> be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with dishonor <S%H3639><s%>, And let them cover <S%H5844><s%> themselves with their own shame <S%H1322><s%> as with a robe <S%H4598><s%>.
I will give great <S%H3966><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with my mouth <S%H6310><s%>; Yea <S%H1984><s%>, I will praise him among <S%H8432><s%> the multitude <S%H7227><s%>.
For he will stand <S%H5975><s%> at the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of the needy <S%H34><s%>, To save <S%H3467><s%> him from them that judge <S%H8199><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%>.
